name: Alila Villas Soori

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When I discovered Alila Villas Soori, I was stuned ! nice website, good reviews, everything to book in confidence (especially with a opening fare).
reviews.title: Disapointing...

reviews.text: So after one week in Ubud, we headed to Tabanan and discovered this fantastic retreat in the middle of nowhere face a marvelous black sand beach...
reviews.title: Secluded and Tranquil

reviews.text: Greeted by a very nice manager, we checked in our amazing villa, met our buttler and were left there enjoying this wonderful moment.
reviews.title: the lost art of solitude

description: Alila Villas Soori located along the southwest coast of Bali, near the island’s famous Tanah Lot Temple, Alila Villas Soori offers beachfront living at its most stylish and luxurious. Its contemporary Asian design is seamlessly crafted into the landscape, gently flowing from verdant rice terraces down to the beautiful black-sand beach, with panoramic views across the azure Indian Ocean.
